item.name: Create a Class Diagram
item.description: Create a diagram on which to model UML classes, UML interfaces, their attributes and operations, the associations between them and their relationships.

item.name: Create a Sequence Diagram
item.description: Create an interaction diagram on which to captures the behavior of a scenario, showing objects and the messages that pass between them.

item.name: Create an Activity Diagram
item.description: Create a diagram on which to model activities, object flow states, decision points and joins, forks and joins, and the transitions between them.

item.name: Create a Use Case Diagram
item.description: Create a diagram on which to model actors, use cases, communications between them, and relationships.

item.name: Create a Diagram of Java Classes
item.description: Create a diagram on which to visually create Java classes, and interfaces, together with their members, inheritance and composition relationships.

item.name: Create a Diagram of EJB/JPA Components
item.description: Create a EJB diagram on which to model entity, session and message-driven beans, their properties and methods, and their relationships and references.

item.name: Create a Database Diagram
item.description: Create a diagram on which to graphically model offline tables and foreign key relationships, views, synonyms and sequences.
